module.name: System Dashboard
module.description: Provides a system information dashboard, showing information about Calls, CPU, Memory, Disks, Network, and processes.
module.changelog: *12.0.21* FREEPBX-8184 Cant remove feeds from dashboard *12.0.20* Better messages *12.0.19* Make this 12 compatible with hooks *12.0.18* FREEPBX-8066 Notification links not used in New Dashboard, FREEPBX-8005 Repeats Previous Alerts *12.0.17* Escape out freepbx object *12.0.16* Tweaks and cleanup *12.0.15* Remove most core service checking to modules *12.0.14* Fix Graph selectors on Firefox, also consistency! *12.0.13* Allow modules to hook into Summary *12.0.12* Default to Asterisk stats *12.0.11* Remove RSS feed setting from dashboard *12.0.10* Dont expand system overview if we are hiding or removing *12.0.9* Fixes fluke Javascript error and allows processing to continue *12.0.8* FREEPBX-7540 Fixed Nothing But Uptime Window Displayed *12.0.7* FREEPBX-7536 allow deleting of deletable messages *12.0.6* Order saving recognized and some cleanup *12.0.5* Be more verbose about php-xml not being installed *12.0.4* Speed improvements. *12.0.3* Drag and drop order sorting and saving *12.0.2* Visuals *12.0.1* Initial checkin of new dashboard for FreePBX 12!
